content: As an AI language model, I am not endorsed to recommend any specific brand or products. However, I can recommend looking for leather waterproofing and conditioning products that are formulated specifically for the type of leather that your jacket is made of. You can also look for products that contain natural oils, such as beeswax, jojoba oil, or coconut oil, as these are gentle on leather and can help to protect and condition it. Always do a patch test on a small, inconspicuous area of your jacket before applying any product to ensure that it does not damage or discolor the leather.
